title: Caterpillar
name: caterpillar
description: Caterpillar is the ultimate logging system for Node.js, based on transform streams you can log to it and pipe the output off to different locations, including some pre-made ones. Caterpillar also supports log levels according to the RFC standard, as well as line, method, and file fetching for messages. You can even use it in web browsers with caterpillar-browser.
author: 2012+ Bevry Pty Ltd <us@bevry.me> (http://bevry.me), 2011 Benjamin Lupton <b@lupton.cc> (https://balupton.com)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ESNext for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES2019 for web browsers with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: yarn run our:compile:deno && yarn run our:compile:edition-browsers && yarn run our:compile:edition-esnext && yarn run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-browsers: tsc --module ESNext --target ES2019 --outDir ./edition-browsers --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-browsers/source || ( mv edition-browsers/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-browsers && mv edition-temp edition-browsers ) )
scripts.our:compile:edition-esnext: tsc --module commonjs --target ESNext --outDir ./edition-esnext --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-esnext/source || ( mv edition-esnext/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-esnext && mv edition-temp edition-esnext ) )
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: yarn run our:meta:contributors && yarn run our:meta:docs && yarn run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: yarn run our:release:prepare && yarn run our:release:check-changelog && yarn run our:release:check-dirty && yarn run our:release:tag && yarn run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: yarn run our:clean && yarn run our:compile && yarn run our:test && yarn run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: yarn run our:verify:directory && yarn run our:verify:eslint && yarn run our:verify:module && yarn run our:verify:prettier
